text:
Hi, 
Looking for some suggestion on Office2016 patching for specific components like
Excel, Outlook, common etc. 
Is there any cumulative update available as it’s very hard to find/list all
missing updates & install them specifically on servers. 
Regards, 
Dhiraj Haritwal 
--
%40KL1PR0401MB4627.apcprd04.prod.outlook.com

metadata.subject: [patchmanagement] Office 2016 Patching

You don't often get email from dhiraj.haritwal@sony.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification]

Excel, Outlook, common etc.

missing updates & install them specifically on servers. 
Regards, 
Dhiraj Haritwal
